TopicTitle: Can't load the game at all

Articles.Content:
While the game is loading it is stucked at 'Loading expansion assets making history 1/2' i tried to reinstall it but didn't help. I am using it on windows 10, can anyone please help? Here is my log file\

[LOG 14:49:38.067] ******* Log Initiated for Kerbal Space Program - 1.4.5.2243 (WindowsPlayer) en-us *******
Kerbal Space Program - 1.4.5.2243 (WindowsPlayer) en-us


OS: Windows 10  (10.0.0)
CPU: AMD Turion(tm) X2 Dual-Core Mobile RM-74 (2)
RAM: 3069
GPU: ATI Mobility Radeon HD 3650 (1147MB)
SM: 30 (Direct3D 9.0c [aticfx32.dll 8.17.10.1129])
RT Formats: ARGB32, Depth, ARGBHalf, Shadowmap, RGB565, ARGB4444, ARGB1555, Default, ARGB2101010, DefaultHDR, ARGB64, ARGBFloat, RGFloat, RGHalf, RFloat, RHalf, RG32


Log started: Sun, Sep 09, 2018 14:49:38

[snip] 

Edited September 9, 2018 by Vanamonde

Welcome to our forum, cornik.

Unfortunately, files that large cause slow page loading or even errors on a forum like this, so yours has been removed. Please upload it to a file sharing site and use the link they provide in your posts here.

Will it load without MH installed?

Should help track down the problem.  Core game or MH.

It looks like you're launching the 32bit version of the game. With the DLC KSP needs more than 4GB of addressable memory. So you need to run the 64bit version. Actually having more than 4GB of RAM would also be helpful.
